00058     AreaEffect::AreaEffect(const String &name, const Vector3 Location)
00059         : Name (name),
00060           Shape (NULL),
00061           GraphicsNode(NULL),
00062           GraphicsObject(NULL),
00063           ShapeType(AE_Unassigned)
00064     {
00065         TheWorld = World::GetWorldPointer();
00066         CreateGhostObject(Location);
00067     }
00068 
00069     AreaEffect::~AreaEffect()
00070     {
00071         delete Ghost;
00072         if(Shape)
00073             delete Shape;
00074     }
00075 
00076     void AreaEffect::CreateGhostObject(const Vector3 Location)
00077     {
00078         Ghost = new btPairCachingGhostObject();
00079         Ghost->setCollisionFlags(Ghost->getCollisionFlags() + btCollisionObject::CF_NO_CONTACT_RESPONSE);
00080         Ghost->getWorldTransform().setOrigin(Location.GetBulletVector3());
00081         ObjectReference* ActorRef = new ObjectReference(phys::WOT_AreaEffect,this);
00082         Ghost->setUserPointer(ActorRef);
00083     }
00084 
00085     Ogre::MaterialPtr AreaEffect::CreateColouredMaterial(const ColourValue& Colour)
00086     {
00087         Ogre::MaterialPtr AEMaterial = Ogre::MaterialManager::getSingletonPtr()->create(Name+"Material", Ogre::ResourceGroupManager::DEFAULT_RESOURCE_GROUP_NAME);
00088         AEMaterial->setReceiveShadows(false);
00089         Ogre::Pass* pass = AEMaterial->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0);
00090         pass->setCullingMode(Ogre::CULL_NONE);
00091         pass->setDepthCheckEnabled(true);
00092         pass->setDepthWriteEnabled(false);
00093         pass->setSceneBlending(Ogre::SBT_TRANSPARENT_ALPHA);
00094         pass->setAmbient(Colour.GetOgreColourValue());
00095         pass->setDiffuse(Colour.GetOgreColourValue());
00096         AEMaterial->prepare();
00097         AEMaterial->load();
00098         return AEMaterial;
00099     }
00100 
00101     void AreaEffect::PreGraphicsMeshCreate()
00102     {
00103         Ogre::SceneManager* OgreManager = World::GetWorldPointer()->GetSceneManager()->GetGraphicsWorldPointer();
00104         if(GraphicsObject)
00105         {
00106             OgreManager->destroyEntity(GraphicsObject);
00107             GraphicsObject = NULL;
00108         }
00109         if(GraphicsNode)
00110         {
00111             OgreManager->destroySceneNode(GraphicsNode);
00112             GraphicsNode = NULL;
00113         }
00114     }
00115 
00116     void AreaEffect::PostGraphicsMeshCreate(String& GroupName)
00117     {
00118         Ogre::SceneManager* OgreManager = World::GetWorldPointer()->GetSceneManager()->GetGraphicsWorldPointer();
00119         GraphicsObject = OgreManager->createEntity(Name,Name + "Mesh", GroupName);
00120         GraphicsNode = OgreManager->createSceneNode();
00121         OgreManager->getRootSceneNode()->addChild(GraphicsNode);
00122         GraphicsNode->setPosition((GetLocation()).GetOgreVector3());
00123         GraphicsNode->attachObject(GraphicsObject);
00124         ObjectReference* AERef = (ObjectReference*)Ghost->getUserPointer();
00125         Ogre::Any OgreRef(AERef);
00126         GraphicsObject->setUserAny(OgreRef);
00127     }
00128 
00129     void AreaEffect::AddActorToList(ActorBase* Actor)
00130     {
00131         AddedActors.push_back(Actor);
00132         OverlappingActors.push_back(Actor);
00133     }
00134 
00135     void AreaEffect::RemoveActorFromList(ActorBase* Actor)
00136     {
00137         RemovedActors.push_back(Actor);
00138         for( std::list<ActorBase*>::iterator c=OverlappingActors.begin(); c!=OverlappingActors.end(); c++)
00139         {
00140             if ( Actor == (*c) )
00141             {
00142                 OverlappingActors.erase(c);
00143             }
00144         }
00145     }
00146 
00147     void AreaEffect::UpdateActorList()
00148     {
00149         if ( !(AddedActors.empty()) )
00150             AddedActors.clear();
00151         if ( !(RemovedActors.empty()) )
00152             RemovedActors.clear();
00153         btSoftRigidDynamicsWorld* PhysWorld = TheWorld->GetPhysicsManager()->GetPhysicsWorldPointer();
00154         //PhysWorld->getDispatcher()->dispatchAllCollisionPairs(Ghost->getOverlappingPairCache(), PhysWorld->getDispatchInfo(), PhysWorld->getDispatcher());
00155 
00156         int OverlappingPairs = Ghost->getOverlappingPairCache()->getNumOverlappingPairs();
00157         btBroadphasePair* Pair = Ghost->getOverlappingPairCache()->getOverlappingPairArrayPtr();
00158         std::list<ActorBase*>::iterator it = OverlappingActors.begin();
00159         // Make a bool vector to keep track of which actors to keep when updating.
00160         std::vector<bool> Tracker;
00161         Tracker.resize(OverlappingActors.size());
00162         std::vector<bool>::iterator bit;
00163         for ( bit = Tracker.begin() ; bit != Tracker.end() ; bit++ )
00164         {
00165             (*bit) = false;
00166         }
00167         // Add objects to the necessary lists as needed.  Also track what needs to be removed for later.
00168         for ( int x=0 ; x<OverlappingPairs ; x++ )
00169         {
00170             // Get the non-ghost object from a given pair and cast it to a usable pointer.
00171             btCollisionObject* ColObj = Pair[x].m_pProxy0->m_clientObject != Ghost ? (btCollisionObject*)(Pair[x].m_pProxy0->m_clientObject) : (btCollisionObject*)(Pair[x].m_pProxy1->m_clientObject);
00172             ActorBase* Actor = (ActorBase*)(ColObj->getUserPointer());
00173             // Check list for the actor in the pair.
00174             for( it = OverlappingActors.begin(), bit = Tracker.begin() ; it != OverlappingActors.end() ; it++, bit++ )
00175             {
00176                 if ( Actor == (*it) )
00177                 {
00178                     (*bit) = true;
00179                     break;
00180                 }
00181             }
00182             if ( it == OverlappingActors.end() )
00183             {
00184                 AddActorToList(Actor);
00185                 Tracker.push_back(true);
00186             }
00187         }
00188         // Verify they are the same size.  Then remove items from the list as necessary.
00189         if ( OverlappingActors.size() == Tracker.size() )
00190         {
00191             std::list<ActorBase*>::iterator sit = OverlappingActors.begin();
00192             for ( bit = Tracker.begin() ; bit != Tracker.end() ; )
00193             {
00194                 if ( (*bit) == false )
00195                 {
00196                     bit = Tracker.erase(bit);
00197                     ActorBase* Act = (*sit);
00198                     RemovedActors.push_back(Act);
00199                     sit = OverlappingActors.erase(sit);
00200                 }else{
00201                     sit++;
00202                     bit++;
00203                 }
00204             }
00205         }
00206     }

00243     void AreaEffect::CreateShapeFromMesh(String Filename, String Group, bool MakeVisible)
00244     {
00245         Ogre::SceneManager* OgreManager = World::GetWorldPointer()->GetSceneManager()->GetGraphicsWorldPointer();
00246         PreGraphicsMeshCreate();
00247         if(Shape)
00248         {
00249             delete Shape;
00250             Shape = NULL;
00251         }
00252 
00253         GraphicsObject = OgreManager->createEntity(Name, Filename, Group);
00254         Ogre::MeshPtr myMesh = GraphicsObject->getMesh();
00255         Ogre::SubMesh* subMesh = myMesh->getSubMesh(0);
00256         Ogre::IndexData*  indexData = subMesh->indexData;
00257         Ogre::VertexData* vertexData = subMesh->vertexData;
00258 
00259         const Ogre::VertexElement* posElem = vertexData->vertexDeclaration->findElementBySemantic(Ogre::VES_POSITION);
00260         Ogre::HardwareVertexBufferSharedPtr vBuffer = vertexData->vertexBufferBinding->getBuffer(posElem->getSource());
00261         Ogre::HardwareIndexBufferSharedPtr iBuffer = indexData->indexBuffer;
00262 
00263         unsigned int triCount = indexData->indexCount/3;
00264         Ogre::Vector3* vertices = new Ogre::Vector3[vertexData->vertexCount];
00265         unsigned int* indices = new unsigned int[indexData->indexCount];
00266         unsigned char* vertex = static_cast<unsigned char*>(vBuffer->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00267         float* pReal = NULL;
00268         for (size_t j = 0; j < vertexData->vertexCount; j++, vertex += vBuffer->getVertexSize() )
00269         {
00270             posElem->baseVertexPointerToElement(vertex, &pReal);
00271             vertices[j].x = *pReal++;
00272             vertices[j].y = *pReal++;
00273             vertices[j].z = *pReal++;
00274         }
00275         vBuffer->unlock();
00276         size_t index_offset = 0;
00277         bool use32bitindexes = (iBuffer->getType() == Ogre::HardwareIndexBuffer::IT_32BIT);
00278 
00279         unsigned long* pLong = static_cast<unsigned long*>(iBuffer->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00280         unsigned short* pShort = reinterpret_cast<unsigned short*>(pLong);
00281 
00282         if (use32bitindexes)
00283         {
00284             for (size_t k = 0; k < triCount*3; ++k)
00285             {
00286                 indices[index_offset++] = pLong[k];
00287             }
00288         }
00289         else
00290         {
00291             for (size_t k = 0; k < triCount*3; ++k)
00292             {
00293                 indices[index_offset++] = static_cast<unsigned long>(pShort[k]);
00294             }
00295         }
00296         iBuffer->unlock();
00297 
00298         btTriangleMesh* trimesh = new btTriangleMesh(use32bitindexes);
00299         btVector3 vert0, vert1, vert2;
00300         int i=0;
00301         for (unsigned int y=0; y<triCount; y++)
00302         {
00303             vert0.setValue(vertices[indices[i]].x, vertices[indices[i]].y, vertices[indices[i]].z);
00304             vert1.setValue(vertices[indices[i+1]].x, vertices[indices[i+1]].y, vertices[indices[i+1]].z);
00305             vert2.setValue(vertices[indices[i+2]].x, vertices[indices[i+2]].y, vertices[indices[i+2]].z);
00306             trimesh->addTriangle(vert0, vert1, vert2);
00307             i+=3;
00308         }
00309         delete[] vertices;
00310         delete[] indices;
00311 
00312         if(MakeVisible)
00313         {
00314             GraphicsNode = OgreManager->createSceneNode();
00315             OgreManager->getRootSceneNode()->addChild(GraphicsNode);
00316             GraphicsNode->attachObject(GraphicsObject);
00317         }else{
00318             OgreManager->destroyEntity(GraphicsObject);
00319             GraphicsObject = NULL;
00320         }
00321 
00322         Shape = new btGImpactMeshShape(trimesh);
00323         Ghost->setCollisionShape(Shape);
00324         ShapeType = AE_Custom;
00325     }
00326

00342             GraphicsNode->setPosition(Location.GetOgreVector3());
00343     }

00361     void AreaEffect::CreateGraphicsSphere(const ColourValue& Colour, const Whole Rings, const Whole Segments)
00362     {
00363         if(AreaEffect::AE_Sphere != ShapeType)
00364         {
00365             TheWorld->Log("Attempting to create sphere graphics shape when AreaEffect isn't a sphere is not supported.  Exiting Function.");
00366             return;
00367         }
00368         String MatName = (CreateColouredMaterial(Colour))->getName();
00369         CreateGraphicsSphere(MatName,Rings,Segments);
00370     }
00371 
00372     void AreaEffect::CreateGraphicsSphere(String& MaterialName, const Whole Rings, const Whole Segments)
00373     {
00374         if(AreaEffect::AE_Sphere != ShapeType)
00375         {
00376             TheWorld->Log("Attempting to create sphere graphics shape when AreaEffect isn't a sphere is not supported.  Exiting Function.");
00377             return;
00378         }
00379         Ogre::SceneManager* OgreManager = World::GetWorldPointer()->GetSceneManager()->GetGraphicsWorldPointer();
00380         PreGraphicsMeshCreate();
00381         Ogre::MaterialPtr TheMaterial = Ogre::MaterialManager::getSingleton().getByName(MaterialName);
00382         String GroupName = TheMaterial->getGroup();
00383         Real Radius = (static_cast<btSphereShape*>(Shape))->getRadius();
00384         MeshGenerator::CreateSphereMesh(Name + "Mesh",MaterialName,Radius,Rings,Segments);
00385         PostGraphicsMeshCreate(GroupName);
00386     }
00387 
00388     void AreaEffect::CreateGraphicsCylinder(const ColourValue& Colour)
00389     {
00390         if(AreaEffect::AE_CylinderX != ShapeType && AreaEffect::AE_CylinderY != ShapeType && AreaEffect::AE_CylinderZ != ShapeType)
00391         {
00392             TheWorld->Log("Attempting to create cylinder graphics shape when AreaEffect isn't a cylinder is not supported.  Exiting Function.");
00393             return;
00394         }
00395         String MatName = (CreateColouredMaterial(Colour))->getName();
00396         CreateGraphicsCylinder(MatName);
00397     }
00398 
00399     void AreaEffect::CreateGraphicsCylinder(String& MaterialName)
00400     {
00401         if(AreaEffect::AE_CylinderX != ShapeType && AreaEffect::AE_CylinderY != ShapeType && AreaEffect::AE_CylinderZ != ShapeType)
00402         {
00403             TheWorld->Log("Attempting to create cylinder graphics shape when AreaEffect isn't a cylinder is not supported.  Exiting Function.");
00404             return;
00405         }
00406         Ogre::SceneManager* OgreManager = World::GetWorldPointer()->GetSceneManager()->GetGraphicsWorldPointer();
00407         PreGraphicsMeshCreate();
00408         Ogre::MaterialPtr TheMaterial = Ogre::MaterialManager::getSingleton().getByName(MaterialName);
00409         String GroupName = TheMaterial->getGroup();
00410         Vector3 Half((static_cast<btCylinderShape*>(Shape))->getHalfExtentsWithoutMargin());
00411         switch(ShapeType)
00412         {
00413             case AreaEffect::AE_CylinderX:
00414                 MeshGenerator::CreateCylinderMesh(Name + "Mesh",MaterialName,Half,Vector3(1,0,0));
00415                 break;
00416             case AreaEffect::AE_CylinderY:
00417                 MeshGenerator::CreateCylinderMesh(Name + "Mesh",MaterialName,Half,Vector3(0,1,0));
00418                 break;
00419             case AreaEffect::AE_CylinderZ:
00420                 MeshGenerator::CreateCylinderMesh(Name + "Mesh",MaterialName,Half,Vector3(0,0,1));
00421                 break;
00422             default:
00423                 return;
00424         }
00425         PostGraphicsMeshCreate(GroupName);
00426     }
00427 
00428     void AreaEffect::CreateGraphicsBox(const ColourValue& Colour)
00429     {
00430         if(AreaEffect::AE_Box != ShapeType)
00431         {
00432             TheWorld->Log("Attempting to create box graphics shape when AreaEffect isn't a box is not supported.  Exiting Function.");
00433             return;
00434         }
00435         String MatName = (CreateColouredMaterial(Colour))->getName();
00436         CreateGraphicsBox(MatName);
00437     }
00438 
00439     void AreaEffect::CreateGraphicsBox(String& MaterialName)
00440     {
00441         if(AreaEffect::AE_Box != ShapeType)
00442         {
00443             TheWorld->Log("Attempting to create box graphics shape when AreaEffect isn't a box is not supported.  Exiting Function.");
00444             return;
00445         }
00446         Ogre::SceneManager* OgreManager = TheWorld->GetSceneManager()->GetGraphicsWorldPointer();
00447         PreGraphicsMeshCreate();
00448         Ogre::MaterialPtr TheMaterial = Ogre::MaterialManager::getSingleton().getByName(MaterialName);
00449         String GroupName = TheMaterial->getGroup();
00450         /// @todo The HalfExtents returned here includes scaling, should account for that so weird scaling sync issues don't occur.
00451         Vector3 Half((static_cast<btBoxShape*>(Shape))->getHalfExtentsWithoutMargin());
00452         MeshGenerator::CreateBoxMesh(Name + "Mesh",MaterialName,Half);
00453         PostGraphicsMeshCreate(GroupName);
00454     }

00482     void TestAE::ApplyEffect()
00483     {
00484         std::vector<ActorBase*>::iterator AaRIt;
00485         std::list<ActorBase*>::iterator CurrIt;
00486         ActorBase* Act = NULL;
00487 
00488         if ( !AddedActors.empty() )
00489         {
00490             TheWorld->Log("Actors Added to field this frame:");
00491             for ( AaRIt = AddedActors.begin() ; AaRIt != AddedActors.end() ; AaRIt++ )
00492             {
00493                 Act = (*AaRIt);
00494                 TheWorld->Log(Act);
00495             }
00496         }
00497         if ( !RemovedActors.empty() )
00498         {
00499             TheWorld->Log("Actors Removed from field this frame:");
00500             for ( AaRIt = RemovedActors.begin() ; AaRIt != RemovedActors.end() ; AaRIt++ )
00501             {
00502                 Act = (*AaRIt);
00503                 TheWorld->Log(Act);
00504             }
00505         }
00506         if ( !OverlappingActors.empty() )
00507         {
00508             TheWorld->Log("Actors Currently in field this frame:");
00509             for ( CurrIt = OverlappingActors.begin() ; CurrIt != OverlappingActors.end() ; CurrIt++ )
00510             {
00511                 Act = (*CurrIt);
00512                 TheWorld->Log(Act);
00513             }
00514         }
00515     }

00522     }
00523 
00524     GravityField::~GravityField()
00525     {

00527 
00528     void GravityField::ApplyEffect()
00529     {
00530         std::vector<ActorBase*>::iterator It;
00531         PhysicsManager* Physics = TheWorld->GetPhysicsManager();
00532         ActorBase* Act = NULL;
00533 
00534         if ( !AddedActors.empty() )
00535         {
00536             for ( It = AddedActors.begin() ; It != AddedActors.end() ; It++ )
00537             {
00538                 Act = (*It);
00539                 Physics->SetIndividualGravity(Act, Grav);
00540             }
00541         }
00542         if ( !RemovedActors.empty() )
00543         {
00544             for ( It = RemovedActors.begin() ; It != RemovedActors.end() ; It++ )
00545             {
00546                 Act = (*It);
00547                 Physics->SetIndividualGravity(Act, Physics->GetGravity());
00548             }
00549         }
00550     }
00551 
00552     void GravityField::SetFieldGravity(Vector3 Gravity)
00553     {
00554         Grav = Gravity;
00555     }
00556 
00557     Vector3 GravityField::GetFieldGravity()
00558     {
00559         return Grav;
00560     }

00563     // GravityWell functions
00564 
00565     GravityWell::GravityWell(const String &name, Vector3 Location)
00566         : AreaEffect(name, Location),
00567           AllowWorldGrav(true),
00568           Strength(0),
00569           AttenAmount(0),
00570           AttenStyle(GW_Att_None)
00571     {
00572     }
00573 
00574     GravityWell::~GravityWell()
00575     {
00576     }
00577 
00578     void GravityWell::ApplyEffect()
00579     {
00580         if(0 == Strength)
00581             return;
00582         ActorBase* Act = NULL;
00583         ActorRigid* ActRig = NULL;
00584         if(!AllowWorldGrav && !AddedActors.empty())
00585         {
00586             for ( std::vector<ActorBase*>::iterator AA = AddedActors.begin() ; AA != AddedActors.end() ; AA++ )
00587             {
00588                 if(ActorBase::Actorrigid != (*AA)->GetType())
00589                     continue;
00590                 ActRig = dynamic_cast<ActorRigid*>(*AA);
00591                 ActRig->SetIndividualGravity(Vector3());
00592             }
00593         }
00594         if(!OverlappingActors.empty())
00595         {
00596             Vector3 ActorLoc, Direction;
00597             Real Distance, AppliedStrength, InvMass;
00598             Vector3 GhostLoc = this->GetLocation();
00599             for ( std::list<ActorBase*>::iterator OA = OverlappingActors.begin() ; OA != OverlappingActors.end() ; OA++ )
00600             {
00601                 if(ActorBase::Actorrigid != (*OA)->GetType())
00602                     continue;
00603                 //Collect necessary data
00604                 ActorLoc = (*OA)->GetLocation();
00605                 Distance = ActorLoc.Distance(GhostLoc);
00606                 Direction = (GhostLoc - ActorLoc) / Distance;
00607                 switch(AttenStyle)
00608                 {
00609                     case GW_Att_Linear:
00610                         AppliedStrength = Strength - (AttenAmount * Distance);
00611                         break;
00612                     case GW_Att_Quadratic:
00613                         AppliedStrength = Strength - (AttenAmount * (Distance * Distance));
00614                         break;
00615                     default:
00616                         AppliedStrength = Strength;
00617                         break;
00618                 }
00619                 ActRig = static_cast<ActorRigid*>(*OA);
00620                 InvMass = ActRig->GetBulletObject()->getInvMass();
00621                 if(0 != InvMass)
00622                     AppliedStrength *= (1 / ActRig->GetBulletObject()->getInvMass());
00623                 else
00624                     AppliedStrength = 0;
00625                 if(0 > AppliedStrength)
00626                     AppliedStrength = 0;
00627                 //Apply the Force
00628                 ActRig->GetBulletObject()->applyCentralForce((Direction * AppliedStrength).GetBulletVector3());
00629             }
00630         }
00631         if(!AllowWorldGrav && !RemovedActors.empty())
00632         {
00633             Vector3 WorldGrav = TheWorld->GetPhysicsManager()->GetGravity();
00634             for ( std::vector<ActorBase*>::iterator RA = RemovedActors.begin() ; RA != RemovedActors.end() ; RA++ )
00635             {
00636                 if(ActorBase::Actorrigid != (*RA)->GetType())
00637                     continue;
00638                 ActRig = dynamic_cast<ActorRigid*>(*RA);
00639                 ActRig->SetIndividualGravity(WorldGrav);
00640             }
00641         }
00642     }
00643 
00644     void GravityWell::SetFieldStrength(const Real FieldStrength)
00645     {
00646         Strength = FieldStrength;
00647     }
00648 
00649     Real GravityWell::GetFieldStrength()
00650     {
00651         return Strength;
00652     }
00653 
00654     void GravityWell::SetAllowWorldGravity(bool WorldGravity)
00655     {
00656         AllowWorldGrav = WorldGravity;
00657     }
00658 
00659     bool GravityWell::GetAllowWorldGravity()
00660     {
00661         return AllowWorldGrav;
00662     }
00663 
00664     void GravityWell::SetAttenuation(Real Amount, AttenuationStyle Style)
00665     {
00666         AttenAmount = Amount;
00667         AttenStyle = Style;
00668     }
00669 
00670     GravityWell::AttenuationStyle GravityWell::GetAttenuationStyle()
00671     {
00672         return AttenStyle;
00673     }
00674

00678     }
00679 }
